data_table.description: EDIC. Health care delivery of participants with Type 1 diabetes and involved in the "Diabetes Control and Complications Trial (DCCT) and Epidemiology of Diabetes Interventions and Complications Study (EDIC)" project.

variable.name: CLINIC
variable.description: A1. Identifying information. Deidentified EDIC clinic number

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: EDIC form number

variable.name: EDICYEAR
variable.description: EDIC year

variable.name: GOB1
variable.description: B1. Health care delivery. Did you stay in hospital overnight

variable.name: GOB1A
variable.description: B1a. Health care delivery. Total number of times stay in hospital

variable.name: GOB1B
variable.description: B1b. Health care delivery. How many nights all together in hosp

variable.name: GOB1D
variable.description: B1d. Health care delivery. Number of nights in hosp overnight not paid for

variable.name: GOB1DI
variable.description: B1di. Health care delivery. Number of times hospital stay overnight not paid for

variable.name: GOB1DII
variable.description: B1dii. Health care delivery. Total number of nights in hospital not paid for

variable.name: GOB2A
variable.description: B2a. Health care delivery. Endocrinologist: ever seen

variable.name: GOB2B
variable.description: B2b. Health care delivery. Ophthalmologist (check-up) ever seen

variable.name: GOB2C
variable.description: B2c. Health care delivery. Ophthalmologist: ever seen for reason other than diabetes (cataracts)

variable.name: GOB2D
variable.description: B2d. Health care delivery. Optometrist: ever seen

variable.name: GOB2E
variable.description: B2e. Health care delivery. Cardiologist: ever seen

variable.name: GOB2F
variable.description: B2f. Health care delivery. Podiatrist: ever seen

variable.name: GOB2G
variable.description: B2g. Health care delivery. Nephrologist: ever seen

variable.name: GOB2H
variable.description: B2h. Health care delivery. Practitioner: ever seen

variable.name: GOB2I
variable.description: B2i. Health care delivery. Other doctor: ever seen

variable.name: GOB3
variable.description: B3. Health care delivery. Were you a patient in a nursing home

variable.name: GOB3A
variable.description: B3a. Health care delivery. Number of nights stayed in nursing home

variable.name: GOB4A
variable.description: B4a. Health care delivery. Eye doctor: visits per year
variable.value: Less than one visit per year

variable.name: GOB4B
variable.description: B4b. Health care delivery. Foot doctor: visits per year
variable.value: Less than one visit per year

variable.name: GOB4C
variable.description: B4c. Health care delivery. Education specialist: visits per year
variable.value: Less than one visit per year

variable.name: GOB4D
variable.description: B4d. Health care delivery. Dietitian: visits per year
variable.value: Less than one visit per year

variable.name: GOB5
variable.description: B5. Health care delivery. Past 2 weeks total visits to doctors
